description technical detail:
Lenovo ThinkVision LT3053p (30 inch) LED Backlit LCD Monitor
ThinkVision LT3053p 30-inch professional monitor sports a gorgeous 30-inch AH-IPS panel that provides users with a clear and crisp display at 2560 x 1600 resolutions from different angles. Moreover, it delivers a color depth of 1.07 billion colors and an Adobe RGB color gamut of 99% which ensure both color consistency and accuracy. On top of its amazing display, it boasts additional productivity features that provide a distinct user experience; its ThinkVision PIP anywhere solution and keyboard and mouse one switch toggle allow users to simultaneously work between two PC systems seamlessly and effectively.
ThinkVision LT3053p also comes bundled with a professional shading hood and supports color calibrators to further enhance the users viewing experience. To top it all, ThinkVision LT3053p is designed without compromising sustainability by the ENERGY STAR 6.0, TUV Green Mark, EPEAT Gold, TCO Display 6.0, TCO Certified Edge 1.2, and UL Environment Gold. For high performance computing, ThinkVision LT3053p professional monitor is simply the best choice for you.
